channel.title: Client -Packet Error Help
channel.description:
Hi everytime i try going on my server with bluurs client, it logs in with a black screen for one second and then it d'cs you out. The same thing happens when i repeat it. This is the error i get [code]Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection[/code]. When i go on my mates server; with bluurs client it's all fine ; it's like any other ordinary client.... But i CAN ONLY go on my mates server with BLUURS client. If you use a different client your acc will seem like its glitched/nulled Whereas on my server you can go on any client and it's just normal EXCEPT BLUURS client As i said above it just logs in with a black screen for about one second then d'cs you out
Note; me and my mates have same source which is ddspeced source
Can you tell how to fix this please thanks.

item.title: Client -Packet Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hi
everytime i try going on my server with bluurs client, it logs in with a black screen for one second and then it d’cs you out. The same thing happens when i repeat it.
This is the error i get Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection.
When i go on my mates server; with bluurs client it’s all fine ; it’s like any other ordinary client…
But i CAN ONLY go on my mates server with BLUURS client. If you use a different client your acc will seem like its glitched/nulled
Whereas on my server you can go on any client and it’s just normal EXCEPT BLUURS client
As i said above it just logs in with a black screen for about one second then d’cs you out

Note; me and my mates have same source which is ddspeced source

Can you tell how to fix this please thanks.

Read full topic
